word: FAQ
What types of door state sensors is the ButterflyMX 2-Door Access Controller
compatible with?
hard wired door state sensor is compatible with the ButterflyMX 2-Door Access Controller: Note that we do not support or
Any
integrate with any wireless door state sensors
Do we support door state sensors on the Intercoms?
they
Not yet, but
will be available soonl
We are planning to integrate door state sensors with the next-generation 8" and 12" Intercoms, estimated completion date in Q2
2024. Note that existing 7" and 11.6" Intercoms are not compatible with Door State Sensors.
Do door state sensors work offline?
Yesl
forced open regardless of the controller's connection
Once activated, door state sensors will record open; closed, and left ajar
status. If the controller is offline, the records will be uploaded to the ButterflyMX OS Door Releases page once the controller
comes back online.
Do we support text message notifications for door state sensors?
Not yet, but they will be available soon! Estimated completion date in Q1 2024.
